channel.title: [PI] - Dragon Scimitar, got idea, but how i do that?
channel.description: Need if you spec someone with d scimi then his prayer will off. For example if he was protected melee and porotect item then they will off. How to do it??

item.title: [PI] - Dragon Scimitar, got idea, but how i do that?
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“The7thSanctum, post:17, topic:521634”][quote author=Cuber317 link=topic=640146.msg4314602#msg4314602 date=1371246036]

then you shouldn’t be making an rsps

It’s rather ironic coming from you.

But i know how to do simple jobs like that, I’m not keen on errors.
[/quote]

I have no need in arguing today. I’m not going to bother.

Here’s some useful information:

public void activateSpecial case 4587: (D Scim Id) Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c.getCombat().activatePrayer(18);[/quote]Where i add this, and under what ?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Dragon Scimitar, got idea, but how i do that?
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:521634”]considering it’s PI…something like

c.stopPrayDelay = System.currentTimeMills(); c.prayerActive[blahid] = false; c.getPA().requestUpdates(); [/quote]Okay where i add those ? for which class and under what ?

item.title: [PI] - Dragon Scimitar, got idea, but how i do that?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

considering it’s PI…something like

c.stopPrayDelay = System.currentTimeMills();
c.prayerActive[blahid] = false;
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
